Jungle Rumble vs Another Player Instructions Select your opponent If your opponent is another player, select “connect” to pair the two phones together to allow communication. Follow directions on screen to enable communication between both devices. Also, when in the game, make sure that both players press an animal within 1 second of each other, or just say “rock paper scissors”, then you both press an animal. 3) Choose the animal that you would like to battle with and wait for the result. 4) There are 3 animals and you have 5 points of life. Elephant beats cat, cat beats mouse, and mouse beats elephant
Jungle Rumble vs the Computer Instructions 1) Choose the animal that you would like to battle with and wait for the result. 2) In level 1, there are 3 animals and you have 5 points of life. Elephant > cat, cat > mouse, mouse > elephant 3) In level 2, Dog and Rabbit are added to game and you have 7 points of life. This time you are playing with 5 animals Elephant beats > cat and dog Mouse beats > elephant and dog Dog beats > cat and rabbit Rabbit beats > mouse and elephant Cat beats > mouse and rabbit 4) In level 3, Giraffe and Pig are added to the game and you have 8 points of life. Mouse beats > elephant, giraffe, and dog Elephant beats > cat, dog, and rabbit Dog beats > cat, rabbit, and pig Pig beats > mouse, elephant, and giraffe Cat beats > mouse, pig, and rabbit Rabbit beats > mouse, pig, and giraffe Giraffe beats > dog, cat, and elephant 4) Have Fun!!!!
